hooks.command: filepath="$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$filepath" ] && echo "$filepath" | grep -q '\.md$\|\.MD$'; then WORKSPACE=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$WORKSPACE" ] && [ -f "$WORKSPACE/check-markdown-rules.sh" ]; then bash "$WORKSPACE/check-markdown-rules.sh" "$filepath"; fi; fi
